mapper.select: select d_number, d_model, d_status, d_weight, d_battery from drone where d_number = #{drone_no}
mapper.insert: insert into DRONE(D_NUMBER, D_MODEL, D_STATUS, D_WEIGHT, D_BATTERY) values((select max(d_number) from drone)+1, #{d_model}, #{d_status}, #{d_weight}, #{d_battery})
mapper.update: update drone set d_model=#{d_model}, d_status=#{d_status}, d_weight=#{d_weight}, d_battery=#{d_battery} where d_number=#{d_number}
